prompts.text: A professional corporate headshot, wearing a dark blue suit and a crisp white shirt, against a softly blurred modern office background.
An outdoor business portrait with natural, golden hour lighting, wearing a smart casual blazer.
A creative professional's headshot, in a studio with minimalist decor, wearing a turtleneck sweater, looking directly at the camera.
A dramatic film noir portrait, black and white, with high contrast lighting casting shadows across the face, wearing a classic trench coat.
A vibrant, neon-lit portrait in a futuristic city at night, like a scene from Blade Runner, with reflections in the eyes.
A Western movie style portrait, with a rugged leather jacket, set against a dusty, sun-bleached landscape at sunset.
A portrait of a noble elf, with intricate silver armor and long flowing hair, in an enchanted, glowing forest.
A powerful sorcerer casting a spell, with magical energy crackling around their hands, wearing ornate robes.
A gritty, battle-hardened warrior in the style of Game of Thrones, with leather and fur armor, in a snowy, mountainous region.
